name: @ptkdev/node-cli-boilerplate
description: Create node cli with this user friendly boilerplate. Use this respository as template for your new npm command line interface project
author: Patryk Rzucid≈Ço [@ptkdev] <support@ptkdev.io> (https://ptk.dev)

scripts.setup: ts-node scripts/setup.ts && ts-node scripts/changelog.ts && npm run pre-commit && npm install
scripts.dev: DEBUG=true npm run git-hash && ts-node scripts/configs.ts && ts-node scripts/rmdist.ts && nodemon --exec 'ts-node app/cli/cli.ts'
scripts.release: DEBUG=false npm run git-hash && npm run build && tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.git-set-upstream: git remote add upstream git@github.com:ptkdev-boilerplate/node-cli-boilerplate.git && git fetch upstream
scripts.git-pull-upstream: git pull upstream main && git pull upstream beta && git pull upstream nightly
scripts.git-ignore-reset: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m "[Fix] Removing all files in .gitignore"
scripts.npm-publish-beta: git checkout beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.npm-publish-nightly: git checkout nightly && npm publish --tag nightly
scripts.pre-commit: ts-node scripts/copyright.ts && npm run contributors-generate && npm run all-shields-generate && npm run lint-fix && npm run test
scripts.pkg-clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && husky install
scripts.pkg-upgrade: npx --yes npm-check-updates -u && npm install typescript@4 --save-dev && husky install
